name: Two Kingdoms
description:
In the game TWO KINGDOMS you have to defend your castle from an evil neighbor.
Your forces are opposed by equal enemy forces. You can choose the type of troops that will be sent to battle.
Improvements are available to your soldiers to make them stronger.
You have other skills, like mines, to fight off your opponent.
Put the bogus in the form of a scarecrow, so that enemies are distracted by it, instead of your soldiers. The tower will also help in the struggle for victory.
Save your kingdom!


Features:
-Defensive abilities
-Multiple types of troops
Improvements to buildings
-Bright painting
